value.readme:
A simple package to add arrows and dashes


| Symbol | Shortcut |
|--------|----------|
| —     | `\--`, `\mdash`, or `\emdash`    |
| –     | `\ndash` or `\endash`    |
| <200b> (zero-width space)    | `\zwsp`  |
| •     | `\bul`   |
| ✓    | `\check` |
| §     | `\\sect` (Two slashes to avoid collision with LaTeX)    |
| →     | `\rarrow`    |
| ←     | `\larrow`    |
| ↑     | `\uarrow`    |
| ↓     | `\darrow`    |
| ⟷     | `\lrarrow`   |

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - trigger: "\\--"
    replace: "—"
  - trigger: "\\mdash"
    replace: "—"
  - trigger: "\\emdash"
    replace: "—"
  - trigger: "\\ndash"
    replace: "–"
  - trigger: "\\endash"
    replace: "–"
  - trigger: "\\zwsp"
    replace: "<200b>"
  - trigger: "\\bul"
    replace: "•"
  - trigger: "\\check"
    replace: "✓"
  - trigger: "\\\\sect"
    replace: "§"
  - trigger: "\\rarrow"
    replace: "→"
  - trigger: "\\larrow"
    replace: "←"
  - trigger: "\\uarrow"
    replace: "↑"
  - trigger: "\\darrow"
    replace: "↓"
  - trigger: "\\lrarrow"
    replace: "⟷"
